On December 23, media reported that Ai Fen once again exposed an account form showing that Guigang Aier Eye Hospital bribed 42 local public officials, involving shopping cards worth 59,000 yuan.
Guigang Discipline Inspection Commission issued a notice stating that it would conduct an investigation and handle the case in accordance with the law

content:
On December 24, Liu Jipeng, a financial expert who had called on investors not to enter the market, said in his WeChat Moments that he would no longer serve as the dean of the Capital Finance Research Institute of China University of Political Science and Law on December 7. 
Previously, some of Liu Jipeng's social media accounts were banned for calling on investors not to enter the market.
